001package org.nasdanika.resources;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.function.Predicate;
006import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
007import java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream;
008
009import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
010
011/**
012 * Binds EntityContainer to {@link InputStream} and {@link BinaryEntity}.
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016public interface BinaryEntityContainer extends EntityContainer<InputStream,BinaryEntity>, BinaryResource {
017        
018        /**
019         * Loads entities from {@link ZipInputStream}
020         * @param zipInputStream
021         * @param filter
022         * @param progressMonitor
023         * @throws IOException
024         */
025        default void load(
026                        ZipInputStream zipInputStream, 
027                        Predicate<String> filter,
028                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {                           
029                load(zipInputStream, filter, (path, state) -> state, progressMonitor);
030        }
031        
032        /**
033         * Stores entities to {@link ZipOutputStream}
034         * @param zipOutputStream
035         * @param prefix
036         * @param progressMonitor
037         * @throws IOException
038         */
039        default void store(
040                        ZipOutputStream zipOutputStream, 
041                        String prefix, 
042                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {           
043                store(zipOutputStream, prefix, (path, state) -> state, progressMonitor);
044        }
045        
046        /**
047         * Narrowing down return type for convenience.
048         */
049        @Override
050        default BinaryContainer stateAdapter() {
051                return new BinaryContainerImpl(EntityContainer.super.stateAdapter());
052        }
053        
054        /**
055         * Narrows return type.
056         */
057        @Override
058        BinaryEntityContainer getContainer(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor);
059        
060        /**
061         * Narrows return type.
062         */
063        @Override
064        BinaryEntityContainer getParent();
065        
066        /**
067         * Narrows return type.
068         */
069        @Override
070        BinaryResource find(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor);
071
072}
